sentences.sContent: The area has a long tradition of horticulture.
sentences.sContent_eng: The area has a long tradition of horticulture.
sentences.sCn: 园艺是这个地区源远流长的传统。

sentences.sContent: Thus, to earn a Plant Science merit badge, a scout can choose between agronomy, horticulture, or field botany.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thus, to earn a Plant Science merit badge, a scout can choose between agronomy, horticulture, or field botany.
sentences.sCn: 因此，为了赚取植物科学奖章，一个童子军可以选择农学，园艺，或田野植物学。

sentences.sContent: All volunteers first go through orientation sessions, which are followed with one of three more specific training tracks:horticulture, “Ambassadors, ” and animal care.
sentences.sContent_eng: All volunteers first go through orientation sessions, which are followed with one of three more specific training tracks:horticulture, “Ambassadors, ” and animal care.
sentences.sCn: 所有的志愿者先要通过新成员训练，然后再在三种特殊训练规划（园艺、“大使”和动物照料）中选择一种。

trans.tranOther: the practice or science of growing flowers, fruit, and vegetables
